about_the_game:
"Dress the Duel" is a roguelike deckbuilding game where your cards are your wardrobe and your outfit is your arsenal!

Build a versatile wardrobe, strip strategically, layer outfits for powerful effects, and Dress the Duel!

Features
- Wardrobe-based card system: Your deck is your closet!
- Strategic layering mechanics: Combine up to four layers for maximum effect
- Tactical stripping: Remove layers of clothing for powerful bonuses or to counter enemy attacks
- Dynamic dress-up system: Watch your avatar change with every card played
- Synergistic outfit combinations: Discover powerful interactions between costumes
- Roguelike deckbuilding: Expand your wardrobe as you progress through each run
